{{also|十八骑燕将}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=十八骑燕将}}

===Etymology===
Since [[w:Zhang Fei|Zhang Fei]] originally lived in [[w:Zhuozhou|Zhuo County]] (in the [[w:Yan (state)|state of Yan]]), it is likely that these 18 bodyguards had been with [[w:Zhang Fei|Zhang Fei]] since that time.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shí bā jì Yān jiàng
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} the eighteen cavalry generals of [[w:Yan (state)|Yan]] (the eighteen bodyguards who provided protection to [[w:Zhang Fei|Zhang Fei]])
